title: 'My whole family has disappeared': Residents describe destruction after Congo flood
description: More than 200 people have died and many are missing in eastern Democratic Republic of Congo after heavy rainfall caused flash flooding and landslides.

title: Russian mercenary chief 'promised ammunition' after threatening Bakhmut retreat
description: Days after he launched a furious tirade against Russia's military leadership and threatened to withdraw his forces from Bakhmut, the head of mercenary group has said it would continue to lead the offensive on the city in eastern Ukraine.

title: Arab League readmits Syria as relations with Assad normalize
description: Arab government representatives in Cairo voted Sunday to return Syria to the Arab League after a 12-year suspension, according to the organization.

title: In coastal Bangladesh, climate change devastates women’s reproductive health
description: SATKHIRA, Bangladesh — On a cloudy Friday morning, Asma Akhter took a break from fishing for minnows.

title: Situation around Europe's largest nuclear power plant is 'potentially dangerous,' watchdog warns
description: The situation in the area near Europe’s largest nuclear power plant is “becoming increasingly unpredictable and potentially dangerous,” the head of the U.N.’s nuclear watchdog said Saturday.

title: At least 12 killed in multi-vehicle crash in Turkey
description: A multi-vehicle crash in southern Turkey’s Hatay province killed at least 12 people and injured 31 others, including three seriously, officials said.
